Summarize the following article "The Benefits of Artificial Intelligence" within 100 words.
AI is rapidly becoming an integral part of our lives, and its potential applications are vast. AI could help minimize human labor while eliminating certain tasks altogether, such as data entry or document management. It can also be used to automate processes that are too complex or time-consuming for humans, increase accuracy and reduce errors, speed up research and development, improve customer service, and increase efficiency and productivity.

Artificial Intelligence (AI) is increasingly essential in daily life, offering vast potential applications. It can reduce human labor by eliminating tasks like data entry and document management and automate complex or time-consuming processes. AI enhances accuracy, reduces errors, accelerates research and development, improves customer service, and boosts efficiency and productivity.
